item.description:
Purity Ring makes electronic music full of pulsating synths, choppy beats, and cut up vocals, occasionally hinting at something darker under the almost twee melodies and vocals... a suggestion definitely helped by singer Megan James' cryptic and often creepy lyrics.
Also, the other member plays this music live by drumming the electronic parts on a homemade rig hooked to a giant tree-like thing complete with dangly glowing cocoon things. For reals! Fun facts.

Songs!
Obedear: http://youtu.be/ETbGpGJNVLM
Belispeak: http://youtu.be/wVcOwVD4V30
Fineshrine: http://youtu.be/muL0Q6z0TWo

When/where to meet!
7 PM at the Lansdowne Pub (9 Lansdowne St), for drinks, and if you are so inclined, food. We can head over to the venue when it comes closer to 8 to catch Young Magic.

Other details!

Openers: Young Magic
Doors at 7 PM; Show at 8 PM; 18+ Show - Advance Box Office Price $15, $17 day of show (it could sell out though, so you might want to get your tickets soon!)
item.name: Purity Ring @ The Paradise
